name: Eduardo Martinez
headerTaglineOne: I'm Eduardo Martinez, passionate about computing and mathematics.

projects.title: Ticketing System for Abscence Manegement

services.title: Software Development
services.description: I specialize in building robust and scalable software solutions tailored to your business needs. From web applications to backend services, I use modern technologies to create efficient and maintainable systems.

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: I provide comprehensive data analysis services, transforming raw data into actionable insights. Whether it's data cleaning, statistical analysis, or creating visualizations, I help you make informed decisions based on data.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I create and optimize your online presence with responsive and interactive web applications. From frontend design to backend functionality, I ensure your website is a powerful tool for engaging users and driving revenue.

services.title: Technical Consulting
services.description: I offer consulting services to help you navigate the complexities of modern technology. From selecting the right tools and technologies to optimizing your existing systems, I provide strategic guidance to enhance your tech capabilities.

aboutpara: I'm Eduardo Martinez, my passion lies in the realms of mathematics, computer science, and physics, and I'm determined to build a career that seamlessly integrates all three. As a self-taught individual, I thrive on learning new things and proactively tackling challenges. I find great satisfaction in solving complex problems and am always eager to expand my knowledge: if it sparks my interest, you'll find me fully engaged and enthusiastic.

resume.description: I am a dedicated Junior Software Engineer and Data Analyst, I specialize in creating innovative solutions and leveraging data insights to drive decision-making. With a strong foundation in both software development and data analysis, I thrive in dynamic environments where I can contribute to impactful projects. My skills in full stack development, combined with my analytical abilities, allow me to tackle complex challenges and deliver high-quality results. I'm committed to continuous learning and collaborating with teams to achieve technological excellence.

experiences.bullets: Work with different clients according to needs, Experience dealing with client relationships and making budgets
Helped configure SAP abscence management system during an internship

experiences.position: Data Entry Specialist at Partner Hero
experiences.bullets: Data entry to track errors ocurring during production, Provide reports of common trends and issues
